name: Saffira Angels Balance
author: MauMP
notes: Tried to reach KOG with my SSA deck but I faced SO many sylvans and if i didn´t draw my abyss soldier or whale with SSA on turn one against their mushrooms then they´d be able to do their whole combo and would probably win. So I just switched to my old Saffira angels deck and got a lot of free wins against those all the way until KOG
